title: Fix login bug
description: Resolve authentication issues causing users to be unable to log in with valid credentials. Investigate session management and token validation.

title: Improve dashboard loading
description: Optimize dashboard performance by implementing lazy loading, reducing API calls, and improving data caching strategies.

title: Add dark mode
description: Implement dark theme with proper color schemes, contrast ratios, and user preference persistence across the application.

title: Implement user profile settings
description: Create comprehensive user profile page with avatar upload, personal information editing, and privacy settings management.

title: Fix memory leak in dashboard
description: Dashboard component is not properly cleaning up event listeners and subscriptions, causing memory usage to grow over time.

title: Add search functionality
description: Implement global search with filters, auto-complete, and search history for better user experience.

title: Update API documentation
description: Comprehensive update of API documentation including new endpoints, authentication methods, and example requests/responses.

title: Implement email notifications
description: Add email notification system for important events with user preferences and templates for different notification types.

title: Fix responsive design issues
description: Address layout problems on mobile devices, ensure proper breakpoints, and improve touch interactions.

title: Add unit tests for auth module
description: Write comprehensive unit tests for authentication module including login, logout, token refresh, and error handling scenarios.

title: Optimize database queries
description: Analyze and optimize slow database queries, add proper indexing, and implement query caching for better performance.

title: Implement file upload feature
description: Add secure file upload functionality with drag-and-drop, progress indicators, file type validation, and virus scanning.

title: Fix security vulnerability in login
description: Address critical security vulnerability in authentication system including SQL injection prevention and password hashing improvements.

title: Add pagination to issue list
description: Implement efficient pagination for large issue lists with infinite scroll and server-side pagination support.

title: Implement real-time notifications
description: Add real-time notification system using WebSocket connections with fallback to polling for better user engagement.

title: Fix timezone display issues
description: Resolve timezone conversion problems and ensure consistent time display across different user locations and browsers.

title: Add keyboard shortcuts
description: Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions to improve accessibility and power user productivity.

title: Implement data export functionality
description: Allow users to export their data in multiple formats (CSV, JSON, PDF) with customizable filters and scheduling options.

title: Add drag and drop functionality
description: Implement intuitive drag and drop functionality for better user interaction with sortable lists, file uploads, and board management.

title: Fix API rate limiting issues
description: API endpoints are hitting rate limits causing request failures. Implement proper throttling, retry logic, and rate limit handling.

title: Implement two-factor authentication
description: Add 2FA support with TOTP, SMS, and backup codes for enhanced account security and user trust.

title: Add analytics dashboard
description: Create comprehensive analytics dashboard with charts, KPIs, custom date ranges, and exportable reports for business insights.

title: Fix broken image uploads
description: Image upload feature is failing for certain file formats and large files. Implement proper validation, compression, and error handling.
